title: We welcome your furry friends! Pet Friendly! 1 Bd / 1 Ba / 704 SqFt
posting_body: ['Ashland Pines - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 1 / Bath: 1', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 704 sq ft', 'Rent: $1259/Month', 'Terms: 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', "Half off first month's rent!", 'Ashland Pines is a luxury apartment community in Stone Mountain with an array of custom features and amenities designed to ease your busy lifestyle.', 'Conveniently located on Hairston Road, your new home is within minutes of I-285, Stone Mountain Park, Dekalb Medical Center and the Mall at Stonecrest.', 'The expansive 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans and amenities provide an opportunity for you to comfortably relax at home, grill up some food by our over-sized pool or undertake a vigorous workout in our fitness center.', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '➢ Balcony/Patio', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Carpeting', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Kitchen', '➢ Storage Units', '➢ Stove', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Views', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Hardwood Floors', '➢ Linen Closet', '➢ Refrigerator/Freezer', '➢ Trash Compactor', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Wood Burning Fireplace', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '➢ BBQ/Picnic Area', '➢ Conference Room', '➢ Courtyard', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Grill', '➢ Maintenance/Manager on site', '➢ Multi Use Room', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Security System', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Cable/Satellite Available', '➢ Car Wash Area', '➢ Dog Park Pet Care', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Planned Community Activities', '➢ Sports Courts', '➢ Sundeck', '➢ Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining', '➢ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '➢ Wireless Internet Available', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '1247 Adcox Road', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30088', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '2E55A3A7930349']
